text: Kristina Pardalos (born 14 October 1973) is a San Marino judge born in New York City, United States of America and currently the judge of the European Court of Human Rights in respect of San Marino. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Judges of the European Court of Human Rights Category:Sammarinese judges Category:American judges Category:American people of Sammarinese descent Category:Sammarinese judges of international courts and tribunals
title: Kristina Pardalos
